messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly SMS Bundle package.
What does the Weekly SMS Bundle include?
Can you tell me the benefits of the Weekly SMS Bundle?
What resources are provided in the Weekly SMS Bundle?
The Weekly SMS Bundle includes 2,000 SMS. It is priced at Rs. 17 including tax and is valid for 7 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly SMS Bundle package.
How can I activate the Weekly SMS Bundle?
What is the process to subscribe to the Weekly SMS Bundle?
How do I get the Weekly SMS Bundle?
To activate the Weekly SMS Bundle, dial *345*117# or use the My Telenor App. Confirm your mobile number if prompted. The bundle will provide 2,000 SMS for 7 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly SMS Bundle package.
Who can subscribe to the Weekly SMS Bundle?
Can all Telenor customers avail the Weekly SMS Bundle?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Weekly SMS Bundle?
All Telenor subscribers are eligible for the Weekly SMS Bundle. It can only be activated through the website and My Telenor App.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly SMS Bundle package.
How long is the Weekly SMS Bundle valid?
What is the validity period for the Weekly SMS Bundle?
For how many days does the Weekly SMS Bundle remain active?
The Weekly SMS Bundle is valid for 7 days from the date of activation.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly SMS Bundle package.
How can I check my free SMS balance?
What is the process to check my remaining SMS balance?
How do I find out how many SMS I have left?
To check your free SMS balance, dial *111# (charges Rs. 0.24) after subscribing to the Weekly SMS Bundle.
